text: Events for communicating between scripts by running callbacks.
Sends an event to a specified [Character].
params: The function name in a character script.
Optional arguments to be sent to the callback.
return: result					Returns true if the callback was found.

text: Sends an event to the game script.
params: The function name in the game script.
Optional arguments to be sent to the callback.
return: result			Returns true if the callback was found.
